00205     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00206     void PagingLandScapeOptions::init()
00207     {
00208         // sets options that doesn't depend on maps.
00209         if (!isInit)
00210         {
00211             const RenderSystem *renderer = Root::getSingleton().getRenderSystem();
00212             if (renderer)
00213             {
00214                 const RenderSystemCapabilities* caps = renderer->getCapabilities();
00215                                 hasVertexShader = caps->hasCapability(RSC_VERTEX_PROGRAM) && !(StringUtil::startsWith(caps->getMaxFragmentProgramVersion (), "vs_1_0", true));
00216                                 hasVertexShader = caps->hasCapability(RSC_BLENDING) && !(StringUtil::startsWith(caps->getMaxFragmentProgramVersion (), "vs_1_0", true));
00217                 hasFragmentShader = caps->hasCapability(RSC_FRAGMENT_PROGRAM);
00218                 const String &maxShaderVersion = caps->getMaxFragmentProgramVersion ();
00219                 hasFragmentShader2 = hasFragmentShader && !(maxShaderVersion == "ps_1_1" || maxShaderVersion == "ps_1_0");
00220                 numTextureUnits = caps->getNumTextureUnits ();
00221                 isRenderGL = StringUtil::startsWith(renderer->getName(), "OpenGL", false);
00222                 isInit = true;
00223             }
00224         }
00225     }
00226     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00227     void PagingLandScapeOptions::load(const String &filename)
00228     {
00229         std::ifstream fs;
00230                 fs.open(filename.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00231                 if (fs)
00232                 {
00233                         // Wrap as a stream
00234                         DataStreamPtr stream(
00235                                 new FileStreamDataStream(filename, &fs, false));
00236                         load(stream);
00237                 }
00238                 else
00239                 {
00240                         // otherwise try resource system
00241                         DataStreamPtr stream = 
00242                                 ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().openResource(filename);
00243                         
00244                         load(stream);
00245                 }
00246     }
00247     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00248     void PagingLandScapeOptions::load(DataStreamPtr& stream)
00249     {
00250         init();
00251             /* Set up the options : List of map associated with map names.*/
00252             ConfigFile config;
00253             config.load(stream);
00254 
00255         // Go through all sections & settings in the file
00256 
00257         ConfigFile::SettingsIterator setIt = config.getSettingsIterator();
00258         while (setIt.hasMoreElements())
00259         {  
00260             const String name = setIt.peekNextKey();
00261             const String value = setIt.getNext();
00262             mMapList.insert(LandScapeFileNames::value_type(name, value));
00263         }
00264 
00265         LandScapeFileNames::iterator i = mMapList.find("GroupName");
00266         if (i == mMapList.end())
00267         {
00268             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, 
00269                 "You need to define a GroupName where to find the map definition file ",
00270                 "PagingLandScapeOptions::load");
00271         }    
00272                 cfgGroupName = i->second;
00273                 mMapList.erase (i);
00274 
00275 
00276         i = mMapList.find("BatchMode");
00277         if ((i != mMapList.end()) && (i->second == "yes"))
00278         {
00279             mBatchMode = true;
00280             mMapList.erase (i);
00281         }    
00282         else
00283                 {
00284             mBatchMode = false;
00285                 }
00286 
00287         i = mMapList.find("TextureFormatDebug");
00288         if (i != mMapList.end())
00289         {       
00290             TextureFormatDebug = config.getSetting("TextureFormatDebug") == "yes";
00291             mMapList.erase (i);
00292         }
00293 
00294 
00295 
00296         i = mMapList.find("DefaultMap");
00297         if (i == mMapList.end()) 
00298                 {
00299                         if( mBatchMode == false)
00300                         {
00301                                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, 
00302                                         "You need to define a DefaultMap= ",
00303                                         "PagingLandScapeOptions::load");
00304                         }
00305                 }
00306                 else
00307                 {
00308                         mCurrentMap = i->second; 
00309                 }
00310                 if (i != mMapList.end()) 
00311                         mMapList.erase (i);
00312    
00313 
00314 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00315                 ResourceGroupManager * const rgsm = ResourceGroupManager::getSingletonPtr();
00316                 rgsm->initialiseResourceGroup (cfgGroupName);
00317                 LandScapeFileNames::iterator iend = mMapList.end();
00318                 LandScapeFileNames::iterator itCheck = mMapList.begin();
00319                 const String cfgExt(".cfg");
00320                 for (; itCheck != iend; )
00321                 {
00322                         const String mapName (itCheck->first);
00323                         const String mapFileName (itCheck->second);
00324                         if ( 
00325                                 !rgsm->resourceExists(cfgGroupName, mapFileName) 
00326                                 &&
00327                                 !rgsm->resourceExists(cfgGroupName, mapFileName + cfgExt) 
00328                                 &&
00329                                 !rgsm->resourceExists(cfgGroupName, mapName + cfgExt)
00330                                 &&
00331                                 !rgsm->resourceExists(cfgGroupName, mapName)
00332                                 )
00333                         {
00334                                 mMapList.erase (itCheck++);
00335                         }
00336                         else
00337                         {
00338                                 ++itCheck;
00339                         }
00340                 }
00341 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
00342 
00343         if (!mBatchMode && !StringUtil::startsWith(mCurrentMap, "none", true))
00344                         loadMap(mCurrentMap);
00345 
00346     }
00347     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00348     const String &PagingLandScapeOptions::getCurrentTextureFormat() const
00349     {
00350         return textureFormat;
00351     }
00352     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00353     void PagingLandScapeOptions::setTextureFormat (const String &format) 
00354     {
00355         if (TextureFormatSupported.end() == std::find(TextureFormatSupported.begin(),
00356                                                  TextureFormatSupported.end(), 
00357                                                  format))
00358         {
00359             TextureFormatSupported.push_back (format);
00360         }
00361         textureFormat = format;
00362         // sort of debugging hack til BigImage itself becomes a chunked Lod thing.
00363         BigImage = BigImage && textureFormat == "Image";
00364         }   
00365         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00366         void PagingLandScapeOptions::insertTextureFormat (const String &format) 
00367         {
00368                 if (TextureFormatSupported.end() == std::find(TextureFormatSupported.begin(),
00369                         TextureFormatSupported.end(), 
00370                         format))
00371                 {
00372                         TextureFormatSupported.push_back (format);
00373                 }
00374         }

00380     }
00381     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00382     const String& PagingLandScapeOptions::getPreviousMapName() const
00383     {
00384         LandScapeFileNames::const_reverse_iterator iend = mMapList.rend();
00385         LandScapeFileNames::const_reverse_iterator i = mMapList.rbegin();
00386         for (; i != iend; ++i)
00387         {
00388             if (i->first == mCurrentMap || i->second == mCurrentMap)
00389             {   
00390                 ++i;
00391                 if (i == iend)
00392                     i = mMapList.rbegin();
00393                 return i->first;
00394             }
00395         }
00396         return StringUtil::BLANK;
00397     }
00398     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00399     const String& PagingLandScapeOptions::getNextMapName() const
00400     {  
00401         LandScapeFileNames::const_iterator iend = mMapList.end();
00402         LandScapeFileNames::const_iterator i = mMapList.begin();
00403         for (; i != iend; ++i)
00404         {
00405             if (i->first == mCurrentMap || i->second == mCurrentMap)
00406             {   
00407                 ++i;
00408                 if (i == iend)
00409                     i = mMapList.begin();
00410                 return i->first;
00411             }
00412         }
00413         return StringUtil::BLANK;
00414     }
00415     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00416     const String& PagingLandScapeOptions::getCurrentMapName() const
00417     {
00418         return mCurrentMap;
00419     }
00420     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00421     void PagingLandScapeOptions::setCurrentMapName(const String& mapName)
00422     {
00423         if (StringUtil::BLANK != mapName)
00424                 {
00425                         LandScapeFileNames::iterator ifind = mMapList.find (mapName);
00426                         if (ifind == mMapList.end())
00427                         {
00428                                 mMapList.insert(LandScapeFileNames::value_type(mapName, mapName));
00429                         }
00430                         mCurrentMap = mapName;
00431         }
00432                 loadMap(mapName);
00433     }
00434     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00435     void PagingLandScapeOptions::loadMap(const String& mapName)
00436     {
00437         std::vector<Ogre::String>::iterator itFileSystem = mResourceFilesystem.begin();
00438         for(; itFileSystem != mResourceFilesystem.end(); ++itFileSystem) 
00439         {
00440             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().removeResourceLocation(
00441                 *itFileSystem, groupName);
00442         }
00443         std::vector<Ogre::String>::iterator itZip = mResourceZip.begin();
00444         for(; itZip != mResourceZip.end(); ++itZip) 
00445         {
00446             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().removeResourceLocation(
00447                 *itZip, groupName);
00448         }
00449 
00450                 // unload cached map info
00451                 clearTileInfo(); 
00452 
00453             /* Set up the options For a Map*/
00454             //ConfigFile config;
00455             loadMapOptions (getMapFilename(mapName)  + String(".cfg"));
00456         }
00457         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00458         const String &PagingLandScapeOptions::getMapFilename(const String &currMapName) const
00459         {
00460                 LandScapeFileNames::const_iterator i = mMapList.find(currMapName);
00461                 LandScapeFileNames::const_iterator iEnd = mMapList.end();
00462                 if (i != iEnd)
00463                         return i->second;
00464 
00465 
00466                 for (i = mMapList.begin(); i != iEnd; ++i)
00467                 {
00468                         if (StringUtil::match(i->second, currMapName, false) || 
00469                                 StringUtil::match(i->first, currMapName, false))
00470                         {
00471                                 return i->second;
00472                         }
00473                 }                       
00474                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, 
00475                         "Cannot locate a Config File defining the map named " + currMapName,
00476                         "PagingLandScapeOptions::loadMap");     
00477         }
00478     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00479     void PagingLandScapeOptions::insertMap(const String& mapName)
00480     {        
00481         LandScapeFileNames::iterator ifind = mMapList.find (mapName);
00482         if (ifind == mMapList.end())
00483         {
00484             mMapList.insert(LandScapeFileNames::value_type(mapName, mapName));
00485         }
00486     }
00487     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00488     void PagingLandScapeOptions::setUint (unsigned int &u, const String &ValuetoGet)
00489         {       
00490                 const String valString = mConfig->getSetting(ValuetoGet);
00491                 if (valString != StringUtil::BLANK)
00492                 {
00493                         u = static_cast<unsigned int> (StringConverter::parseReal(valString));
00494                 }
00495     }

00497     void PagingLandScapeOptions::setBool (bool &b, const String &ValuetoGet)
00498         {
00499                 const String valString = mConfig->getSetting (ValuetoGet);
00500                 if (valString != StringUtil::BLANK)
00501                 {
00502                         b = StringUtil::startsWith(valString, "yes", true);
00503                 }
00504     }

00529         if (val != StringUtil::BLANK)
00530             s = val;
00531     }
00532     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00533     void PagingLandScapeOptions::loadMapOptions(const String& mapName)
00534     {
00535                 unsigned int i;
00536                 
00537         init ();
00538                 setDefault ();
00539 
00540             // Set up the options For a Map
00541             ConfigFile config;
00542             config.load (mapName, cfgGroupName, String("="), true);
00543         mConfig = &config;
00544 
00545 
00546             // Set up the dimensions For a Map
00547         #if !defined(_MAPSPLITTER) && !defined(_MAPEDITOR)
00548 
00549                 setUint (world_height, "Height");
00550                 setUint (world_width, "Width");
00551             if (world_width == 0 || world_height == 0)
00552             {
00553                 OGRE_EXCEPT(1, 
00554                                                     "Your map must at least have a width and height defined in the config file ", 
00555                                                     "PagingLandScapeOptions::loadMapOptions");
00556             }
00557         #endif // !defined(_MAPSPLITTER) && !defined(_MAPEDITOR)
00558 
00559 
00560             setUint (PageSize, "PageSize");
00561         setUint (TileSize, "TileSize");
00562         NumTiles = static_cast<unsigned int> (static_cast <Real> (PageSize) / (TileSize - 1));
00563         NumPages = static_cast<unsigned int> (static_cast <Real> (world_height * world_width));
00564         const unsigned int totalNumTiles = NumPages * (NumTiles*NumTiles) + 1;
00565             
00566             setReal (scale.x, "ScaleX");
00567         setReal (scale.y, "ScaleY");
00568         setReal (scale.z, "ScaleZ");
00569 
00570         setReal( position.x, "PositionX");
00571         setReal( position.y, "PositionY");
00572         setReal( position.z, "PositionZ");
00573         
00574                 // secret tweak helping joining tile using vertex compression
00575                 // leads to texture distortion at page breaks otherwise.
00576                 const double scalemodif = static_cast <double> (PageSize - 1) / PageSize;
00577         ScaledPageSizeX = scale.x * scalemodif;
00578         ScaledPageSizeZ = scale.z * scalemodif;
00579         ScaledHeightY = scale.y / 65535;
00580 
00581         setReal (TextureStretchFactor,  "TextureStretchFactor");
00582 
00583 #if !defined(_MAPSPLITTER) && !defined(_MAPEDITOR)
00584 
00585         // Scale x/z relative to page size
00586         scale.x /= PageSize;
00587         scale.z /= PageSize;    
00588 #else// !defined(_MAPSPLITTER) && !defined(_MAPEDITOR)
00589         //scale.y = scale.y;
00590         scale.x /= PageSize * TextureStretchFactor;
00591         scale.z /= PageSize * TextureStretchFactor;    
00592 
00593 #endif// !defined(_MAPSPLITTER) && !defined(_MAPEDITOR)
00594 
00595             maxUnScaledZ = world_height * (PageSize - 1) * 0.5f;
00596             maxUnScaledX = world_width  * (PageSize - 1) * 0.5f;
00597 
00598             maxScaledZ = scale.z * maxUnScaledZ;
00599             maxScaledX = scale.x * maxUnScaledX;
00600 
00601 
00602             // Set up the names For a Map
00603 
00604         setString (groupName, "GroupName");  
00605         setString (LandScape_filename, "LandScapeFileName");
00606 
00607 
00608                 
00609         //add Resources Group to Ogre if needed.
00610                 StringVector mResourceFilesystem =  config.getMultiSetting("FileSystem");
00611         std::vector<Ogre::String>::iterator itFileSystem = mResourceFilesystem.begin();
00612         for(; itFileSystem != mResourceFilesystem.end(); ++itFileSystem) 
00613         {
00614                         String resourceFileSystem = *itFileSystem;
00615                         String BasePath, FilePath;
00616                         StringUtil::splitFilename(resourceFileSystem, BasePath, FilePath);
00617             if (StringUtil::endsWith  (BasePath, "landscapefilename", true))
00618             {
00619                 BasePath = LandScape_filename;
00620             }
00621             else if (StringUtil::endsWith  (BasePath, "landscapeexportfilename", true))
00622             {
00623                 BasePath = LandScape_export_filename;
00624             }
00625 
00626                         if (FilePath.empty ())
00627                         {
00628                                 FileInfoListPtr finfo = ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo(cfgGroupName, mapName);
00629                                 FilePath = (finfo->begin() != finfo->end())? (finfo->begin())->archive->getName() : ""; 
00630                         }
00631             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation(
00632                  FilePath + "/" + BasePath, "FileSystem", groupName);
00633         }
00634 
00635 
00636         StringVector mResourceZip =  config.getMultiSetting("Zip");
00637         std::vector<Ogre::String>::iterator itZip = mResourceZip.begin();
00638         for(; itZip != mResourceZip.end(); ++itZip) 
00639         {
00640             String resourceZip  = *itZip;
00641 
00642             if (resourceZip != StringUtil::BLANK)
00643             {
00644                 ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation(
00645                     resourceZip, "Zip", groupName);
00646             }
00647         }
00648 
00649             setString (LandScape_filename, "LandScapeFileName");
00650             setString (LandScape_export_filename, "LandScapeExportFileName");
00651             
00652         if (LandScape_export_filename == StringUtil::BLANK)
00653             LandScape_export_filename = LandScape_filename;
00654             
00655             setString (LandScape_extension, "LandScapeExtension");
00656         setString (LandScape_export_extension, "LandScapeExportExtension");
00657         
00658         if (LandScape_export_extension == StringUtil::BLANK)
00659             LandScape_export_extension = LandScape_extension;
00660             
00661         setString (TextureExtension, "TextureExtension");
00662 
00663         setString (image_filename, "ImageFilename");
00664         if (image_filename == "")
00665             ImageNameLoad = false;
00666         else 
00667             ImageNameLoad = true;
00668 
00669             // Set up the data source For a Map
00670             
00671             setString (data2DFormat, "Data2DFormat");
00672             
00673         bool HeightField = StringUtil::endsWith(data2DFormat, "HeightField", false);
00674         bool HeightFieldN = StringUtil::endsWith(data2DFormat, "HeightFieldN", false);
00675         bool HeightFieldTC = StringUtil::endsWith(data2DFormat, "HeightFieldTC", false);
00676         bool HeightFieldNTC = StringUtil::endsWith(data2DFormat, "HeightFieldNTC", false);
00677         bool HeightFieldRawTC = StringUtil::endsWith(data2DFormat, "HeightFieldRawC", false);
00678         bool HeightFieldRaw = StringUtil::endsWith(data2DFormat, "HeightFieldRaw", false);
00679 
00680     
00681         if (StringUtil::endsWith(LandScape_extension, "raw", true))
00682         {
00683             isRaw = true;
00684             setUint (RawHeight, "RawHeight");
00685             setUint (RawWidth, "RawWidth");
00686 
00687             if (HeightField || HeightFieldN)
00688             {
00689                 data2DFormat = "HeightFieldRaw";
00690                 HeightField   = false;
00691                 HeightFieldN = false;
00692                 HeightFieldRaw = true;
00693             }
00694             else if (HeightFieldTC || HeightFieldNTC) 
00695             {
00696                 data2DFormat = "HeightFieldRawTC";
00697                 HeightFieldTC   = false;
00698                 HeightFieldNTC = false;
00699                 HeightFieldRawTC = true;
00700             }
00701         }
00702         else 
00703             isRaw = false;
00704 
00705             if (HeightFieldRawTC 
00706             || HeightFieldTC 
00707             || HeightFieldNTC)
00708         {
00709             setUint (maxValue, "MaxValue");
00710             maxValue *= scale.y;
00711             setUint (minValue, "MinValue");
00712             minValue *= scale.y;
00713         }
00714         else
00715         {
00716             maxValue = static_cast<unsigned int> (scale.y);
00717             minValue = 0;
00718         }
00719 
00720                 setBool (materialPerPage, "MaterialPerPage");
00721                 setBool (textureModifiable, "TextureModifiable");
00722 
00723 
00724             // Set up the splatting options For a Map
00725             
00726                 setUint (NumMatHeightSplat, "NumMatHeightSplat");
00727                 matHeight.reserve (NumMatHeightSplat);
00728                 matHeight.resize (NumMatHeightSplat);
00729                 matColor.reserve (NumMatHeightSplat);
00730                 matColor.resize (NumMatHeightSplat);
00731                 SplatDetailMapNames.reserve (NumMatHeightSplat);
00732                 SplatDetailMapNames.resize (NumMatHeightSplat); 
00733                 
00734                 // Init to 0.0f for lazy config files omitting some.
00735                 for (i = 0; i < NumMatHeightSplat; i++)
00736                 {                       
00737                         matHeight[i] = 0.0f;
00738                 }
00739         const Real divider = (maxValue - minValue) / (100.0f);
00740                 for (i = 0; i < NumMatHeightSplat; i++)
00741                 {
00742                         setReal (matHeight[i], 
00743                                         "MaterialHeight" + StringConverter::toString(i));
00744                         matHeight[i] *= divider;
00745                 }
00746 
00747         const String baseSplatName ("SplatFilename");
00748         for (i = 0; i < NumMatHeightSplat; i++) 
00749             setString (SplatDetailMapNames[i], 
00750                                                 baseSplatName + StringConverter::toString (i));
00751         getAvgColors ();
00752         
00753         Real MaterialDistanceLod = 0.0f;   
00754         setReal (MaterialDistanceLod,"MaterialDistanceLod");
00755         if (MaterialDistanceLod != 0.0f)
00756         {
00757             lodMaterialDistanceList.clear();
00758             lodMaterialDistanceList.push_back (MaterialDistanceLod);
00759         }
00760 
00761 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00762 
00763         // PLUGIN OPTIONS ONLY
00764 
00765             // Set up the vertexes options For a Map
00766             
00767         setBool (colored, "VertexColors");
00768         setBool (coverage_vertex_color, "CoverageVertexColor");
00769         setBool (base_vertex_color, "BaseVertexColor");
00770         setBool (vertex_shadowed, "BaseVertexShadow");
00771         setBool (vertex_instant_colored, "BaseVertexInstantColor");
00772         
00773         // ensure combination are correct 
00774         if (vertex_shadowed)
00775             vertex_instant_colored = true;
00776 
00777         if (coverage_vertex_color || base_vertex_color
00778           )// || vertex_shadowed || vertex_instant_colored)
00779             colored = true;
00780            
00781             // Set up the paging options For a Map
00782             
00783             setUint (num_renderables, "MaxNumRenderables");
00784         num_renderables = (totalNumTiles < num_renderables)?totalNumTiles:num_renderables;
00785             setUint (num_renderables_increment, "IncrementRenderables");
00786 
00787             setUint (num_tiles, "MaxNumTiles");
00788         num_tiles = (totalNumTiles < num_tiles)? totalNumTiles : num_tiles;
00789             setUint (num_tiles_increment, "IncrementTiles");
00790        
00791 
00792             setUint (num_renderables_loading, "NumRenderablesLoading");
00793                 setUint (RenderableLoadInterval, "RenderableLoadInterval");
00794 
00795             setUint (max_adjacent_pages, "MaxAdjacentPages");
00796             setUint (max_preload_pages, "MaxPreloadedPages");
00797                 setUint (PageLoadInterval, "PageLoadInterval");
00798 
00799             // Set up the LOD options For a Map
00800         setUint (maxRenderLevel, "MaxRenderLevel");
00801         if (maxRenderLevel == 100)
00802         {
00803                         maxRenderLevel = 0;
00804                         const unsigned int halftileSize = TileSize * 0.5f;
00805             while (static_cast<unsigned int> ((1 << maxRenderLevel)) < halftileSize )
00806                 maxRenderLevel++;
00807         }
00808 
00809 
00810         setReal (change_factor,  "ChangeFactor");
00811             change_factor *=  (static_cast <Real> (PageSize * (scale.z + scale.x) * 0.5f) / 9);
00812 
00813             // Set up the distance options For a Map
00814             
00815             setReal (visible_renderables, "VisibleRenderables");
00816 
00817             // compute the actual distance as a square
00818         // Factor is a Tile distance squared
00819         const Real Factor = TileSize * scale.x * TileSize * scale.z;
00820 
00821 
00822         // max distance upon which renderables are not rendered anymore
00823             renderable_factor = visible_renderables * Factor;
00824             //renderable_factor *= renderable_factor;
00825 
00826                 //setReal (cameraThreshold,  "CameraThreshold");
00827                 // To avoid the use of a square root.
00828                 //cameraThreshold *= cameraThreshold;
00829                 cameraThreshold = ((scale.x < scale.z ) ? TileSize * scale.x : TileSize * scale.z) * 0.25;
00830 
00831             setReal (distanceLOD, "DistanceLOD");
00832             // Compute the actual distance as a square
00833             LOD_factor = distanceLOD * Factor;
00834                 //LOD_factor *= LOD_factor;
00835                 loadMapInfo();
00836 
00837         setBool (lit, "VertexLit");
00838         setBool (normals, "VertexNormals");
00839         
00840         setBool (Deformable, "Deformable");
00841         if (!Deformable)
00842             saveDeformation = false;
00843         else
00844             setBool (saveDeformation, "SaveDeformation");
00845             
00846         //Morphing
00847         if (maxRenderLevel > 1)
00848         {
00849             setBool (lodMorph, "VertexProgramMorph");
00850             setReal (lodMorphStart, "LODMorphStart");
00851         }            
00852         setUint (maxPixelError, "MaxPixelError");
00853 
00854 
00855         setBool (BigImage, "BigImage");
00856         setBool (VisMap, "HorizonVisibilityComputing");
00857                 setBool (MaxLodUnderCam, "MaxLodUnderCam");
00858         setBool (VertexCompression, "VertexCompression");
00859         VertexCompression = VertexCompression  && hasVertexShader;
00860 
00861 
00862         setUint (NumTextureFormatSupported, "NumTextureFormatSupported");
00863         TextureFormatSupported.reserve (NumTextureFormatSupported);
00864         TextureFormatSupported.resize (NumTextureFormatSupported);
00865         for (i = 0; i < NumTextureFormatSupported; i++)
00866         {
00867             setString (TextureFormatSupported[i], "TextureFormatSupported" + StringConverter::toString(i));
00868         }
00869         String tempTexformat;
00870         setString (tempTexformat, "TextureFormat");
00871         // must be after getting supported formats
00872         setTextureFormat (tempTexformat);
00873 
00874                 setUint (TileInvisibleUnloadFrames, "TileInvisibleUnloadFrames");
00875                 setUint (PageInvisibleUnloadFrames, "PageInvisibleUnloadFrames");
00876                 
00877                 
00878             setReal (BaseCameraViewpoint.x, "BaseCameraViewpoint.x");
00879         setReal (BaseCameraViewpoint.y, "BaseCameraViewpoint.y");
00880         setReal (BaseCameraViewpoint.z, "BaseCameraViewpoint.z");
00881         
00882             setReal (Baselookat.x, "Baselookat.x");
00883         setReal (Baselookat.y, "Baselookat.y");
00884         setReal (Baselookat.z, "Baselookat.z");
00885 
00886                 ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().initialiseResourceGroup (groupName);
00887 #else 
00888         
00889         // MAP TOOL OPTIONS ONLY
00890 
00891         setBool (Paged, "Paged");
00892 
00893         setString (OutDirectory, "OutDirectory");
00894 
00895                 String BasePath, FilePath;
00896                 StringUtil::splitFilename(OutDirectory, BasePath, FilePath);
00897             if (StringUtil::endsWith  (BasePath, "landscapefilename", true))
00898         {
00899             BasePath = LandScape_filename;
00900         }
00901             if (StringUtil::endsWith  (BasePath, "landscapeexportfilename", true))
00902                 {
00903                         BasePath = LandScape_export_filename;
00904                 }
00905                 if (FilePath.empty())
00906                 {
00907                         //Get cfg current Directory
00908 
00909                         FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
00910                                 cfgGroupName, mapName);
00911                         FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();
00912                         if (it != finfo->end())
00913                         {
00914                                 FilePath = (it)->archive->getName();
00915                         }
00916                 }
00917                 if (StringUtil::endsWith  (FilePath, "/", true))
00918                 {
00919                         FilePath.resize (FilePath.size() - 1);
00920                 }
00921                 OutDirectory = FilePath + "/" +  BasePath;
00922 
00923         setBool (MiniMap, "MiniMap");
00924         setBool (BaseMap, "BaseMap");
00925 
00926 
00927         setBool (ColorMapGenerate, "ColorMapGenerate");
00928         setBool (ColorMapSplit, "ColorMapSplit");
00929         setBool (LightMap, "LightMap");
00930         setBool (NormalMap, "NormalMap");
00931         setBool (HeightMap, "HeightMap");
00932         setBool (AlphaMaps, "AlphaMaps");
00933         setBool (LitBaseMap, "LitBaseMap");
00934         setBool (InfiniteMap, "InfiniteMap");
00935         setBool (CoverageMap, "CoverageMap");
00936         setBool (LitColorMapGenerate, "LitColorMapGenerate");
00937         setBool (LitColorMapSplit, "LitColorMapSplit");
00938         setBool (HeightNormalMap, "HeightNormalMap");
00939         setString (ColorMapName, "ColorMapName");
00940 
00941                 if ((BaseMap || CoverageMap || AlphaMaps)
00942                         && NumMatHeightSplat == 0)
00943                         OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00944                         "Generating a texture set from a heightmap needs some MaterialHeights in cfg file.", 
00945                         "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getScale");
00946 
00947         setReal (HeightMapBlurFactor, "HeightMapBlurFactor");
00948 
00949             setReal (Sun.x, "Sunx");
00950         setReal (Sun.y, "Suny");
00951         setReal (Sun.z, "Sunz");
00952 
00953 
00954         setReal (Amb, "Ambient");
00955         setReal (Diff, "Diffuse");
00956         setUint (Blur, "Blur");
00957 
00958         setBool (Equalize, "Equalize");
00959         setBool (ZHorizon, "ZHorizon");
00960 
00961         setBool (SRTM_water, "SRTM_water");
00962 
00963         setUint (MiniMapHeight, "MiniMapHeight");
00964         setUint(MiniMapWidth, "MiniMapWidth");
00965 
00966 
00967                 setUint (NumSplatMapToSplit, "NumSplatMapToSplit");
00968                 SplatMapNames.reserve (NumSplatMapToSplit);
00969                 SplatMapNames.resize (NumSplatMapToSplit);
00970                 
00971                 for (i = 0; i < NumSplatMapToSplit; i++)
00972                 {
00973                         setString (SplatMapNames[i], "SplatMapName" + StringConverter::toString(i));
00974                 }
00975     #endif
00976     }
00977     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00978     void PagingLandScapeOptions::calculateCFactor()
00979     {
00980         // Const Real A = 1 / Math::Tan(Math::AngleUnitsToRadians(opts.primaryCamera->getFOVy()));
00981                 // Turn off detail compression at higher FOVs
00982         const Real A = 1.0f;
00983 
00984                 assert (primaryCamera);
00985         const Viewport *v = primaryCamera->getViewport();
00986         if (v)
00987         {
00988             const int vertRes = v->getActualHeight();
00989             
00990             assert (vertRes != 0);
00991 
00992             const Real T = 2 * static_cast < Real > (maxPixelError) / vertRes;
00993             
00994                         if (T != 0)
00995                 CFactor =  A / T;
00996             else
00997                 CFactor =  A * vertRes * 0.5f;
00998         }
00999     }  
01000     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01001     void PagingLandScapeOptions::setPrimaryCamera(PagingLandScapeCamera *cam)
01002     {
01003         primaryCamera = cam;
01004                 if (cam && cam->getViewport())
01005                         calculateCFactor (); 
01006     } 
01007     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01008     bool PagingLandScapeOptions::setOption(const String& strKey, const void* pValue)
01009     {
01010         if (strKey == "saveDeformation")
01011         {
01012             saveDeformation = * static_cast < const bool * > (pValue); 
01013             return true;
01014         }
01015         if (strKey == "MaxLodUnderCam")
01016         {
01017             MaxLodUnderCam = * static_cast < const bool * > (pValue); 
01018             return true;
01019         }
01020 //          if (strKey == "VisibleRenderables")
01021 //          {
01022 //                  visible_renderables = * static_cast < const int * > (pValue);
01023 //                  // compute the actual distance as a square
01024 //             Real Factor = TileSize;
01025 //             Factor = Factor * scale.x * Factor * scale.z;
01026 // 
01027 //              renderable_factor = visible_renderables * Factor;
01028 //             return true;
01029 //          }
01030             if (strKey == "DistanceLOD")
01031             {
01032                     distanceLOD = * static_cast < const Real * > (pValue);
01033                     // Compute the actual distance as a square
01034             Real Factor = TileSize;
01035             Factor = Factor * scale.x * Factor * scale.z;
01036                 LOD_factor = distanceLOD * Factor;
01037             return true;
01038             }
01039             if (strKey == "Sun")
01040             {
01041             Sun = * static_cast < const Vector3 * > (pValue);
01042                     lightmoved = true;
01043             return true;
01044             }
01045             if (strKey == "SunAngle")
01046             {
01047             SunAngle = * static_cast < const Real * > (pValue);
01048                     lightmoved = true;
01049             return true;
01050             }
01051             if (strKey == "Width")
01052             {
01053                     world_width = * static_cast < const unsigned int * > (pValue) ;
01054 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
01055 #ifndef _MAPEDITOR
01056                 assert (primaryCamera);
01057                         static_cast <PagingLandScapeSceneManager *> (primaryCamera->getSceneManager())->WorldDimensionChange();
01058 
01059 #endif //_MAPEDITOR
01060 #endif  //_MAPSPLITTER
01061                     return true;
01062             }
01063             if (strKey == "Height")
01064             {
01065                     world_height = * static_cast < const unsigned int * > (pValue);
01066 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
01067 #ifndef _MAPEDITOR
01068                 assert (primaryCamera);
01069                         static_cast <PagingLandScapeSceneManager *> (primaryCamera->getSceneManager())->WorldDimensionChange();
01070 #endif //_MAPEDITOR
01071 #endif  //_MAPSPLITTER
01072                     return true;
01073             }
01074             if (strKey == "WorldDimension")
01075             {
01076                     Vector2 dim =  * static_cast < const Vector2 * > (pValue);
01077                     world_height = static_cast < unsigned int > (dim.x);
01078                     world_width  = static_cast < unsigned int > (dim.y);
01079     #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
01080     #ifndef _MAPEDITOR
01081                 assert (primaryCamera);
01082                         static_cast <PagingLandScapeSceneManager *> (primaryCamera->getSceneManager())->WorldDimensionChange();
01083     #endif //_MAPEDITOR
01084     #endif  //_MAPSPLITTER
01085                     return true;
01086             }
01087             if (strKey == "primaryCamera")
01088             {
01089                     setPrimaryCamera (const_cast < PagingLandScapeCamera * > (static_cast < const PagingLandScapeCamera * > (pValue)));
01090                     return true;
01091             }
01092 
01093                 if (strKey == "TextureNameLayer0")
01094             {
01095                         SplatDetailMapNames[0] = * static_cast < const String * > (pValue);
01096                     return true;
01097             }
01098                 if (strKey == "TextureNameLayer1")
01099             {
01100                         SplatDetailMapNames[1] = * static_cast < const String * > (pValue);
01101                     return true;
01102             }
01103                 if (strKey == "TextureNameLayer2")
01104             {
01105                         SplatDetailMapNames[2] =  * static_cast < const String * > (pValue);
01106                     return true;
01107             }
01108                 if (strKey == "TextureNameLayer3")
01109             {
01110                         SplatDetailMapNames[3] =  * static_cast < const String * > (pValue);
01111                     return true;
01112             }
01113 
01114 
01115         if (strKey == "MaxAdjacentPages")
01116         {
01117             max_adjacent_pages = * static_cast < const unsigned int * > (pValue);
01118             return true;
01119         }
01120         if (strKey == "MaxPreloadedPages")
01121         {
01122             max_preload_pages = * static_cast < const unsigned int * > (pValue);
01123             return true;
01124                 }
01125                 if (strKey == "PositionX")
01126                 {
01127                         position.x = * static_cast < const Real * > (pValue);
01128                         return true;
01129                 }
01130                 if (strKey == "PositionY")
01131                 {
01132                         position.y = * static_cast < const Real * > (pValue);
01133                         return true;
01134                 }
01135                 if (strKey == "PositionZ")
01136                 {
01137                         position.z = * static_cast < const Real * > (pValue);
01138                         return true;
01139                 }       
01140 
01141                 if (strKey == "ConfigGroupName")
01142                 {
01143                         cfgGroupName = * static_cast < const String * > (pValue);
01144                         return true;
01145                 }  
01146             return false;
01147     }
01148        
01149     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01150     bool PagingLandScapeOptions::getOption(const String& strKey, void* pDestValue)
01151     {
01152         if (strKey == "saveDeformation")
01153         {
01154             * static_cast < bool * > (pDestValue) = saveDeformation;
01155             return true;
01156         }
01157             if (strKey == "VisibleRenderables")
01158             {
01159                     * static_cast < int * > (pDestValue) = static_cast<int> (visible_renderables);
01160                     return true;
01161             }
01162             if (strKey == "DistanceLOD")
01163             {
01164                     * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) = static_cast<Real> (distanceLOD);
01165                     return true;
01166             }
01167             if (strKey == "VisibleDistance")
01168             {
01169                     // we need to return the square root of the distance
01170             * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) =  Math::Sqrt (renderable_factor);
01171             return true;
01172             }
01173             if (strKey == "VisibleLOD")
01174             {
01175                     // we need to return the square root of the distance
01176                     * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) =  Math::Sqrt (LOD_factor);
01177             return true;
01178             }
01179             // Some options proposed by Praetor
01180             if (strKey == "Width")
01181             {
01182                     * static_cast < int * > (pDestValue) = world_width;
01183                     return true;
01184             }
01185             if (strKey == "Height")
01186             {
01187                     * static_cast < int * > (pDestValue) = world_height;
01188                     return true;
01189             }
01190             if (strKey == "PageSize")
01191             {
01192                     * static_cast < int * > (pDestValue) = PageSize;
01193                     return true;
01194             }
01195             if (strKey == "ScaleX")
01196             {
01197                     * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) = scale.x;
01198                     return true;
01199             }
01200             if (strKey == "ScaleY")
01201             {
01202                     * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) = scale.y;
01203                     return true;
01204             }
01205             if (strKey == "ScaleZ")
01206             {
01207                     * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) = scale.z;
01208                     return true;
01209             }   
01210         if (strKey == "PositionX")
01211             {
01212                     * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) = position.x;
01213                     return true;
01214             }
01215             if (strKey == "PositionY")
01216             {
01217                     * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) = position.y;
01218                     return true;
01219             }
01220             if (strKey == "PositionZ")
01221             {
01222                     * static_cast < Real * > (pDestValue) = position.z;
01223                     return true;
01224             }   
01225     
01226         if (strKey == "TextureNameLayer0")
01227             {
01228                         * static_cast < String * > (pDestValue) =  SplatDetailMapNames[0];
01229                     return true;
01230             }
01231                 if (strKey == "TextureNameLayer1")
01232             {
01233                         * static_cast < String * > (pDestValue) =  SplatDetailMapNames[1];
01234                     return true;
01235             }
01236                 if (strKey == "TextureNameLayer2")
01237             {
01238                         * static_cast < String * > (pDestValue) =  SplatDetailMapNames[2];
01239                     return true;
01240             }
01241                 if (strKey == "TextureNameLayer3")
01242             {
01243                         * static_cast < String * > (pDestValue) =  SplatDetailMapNames[3];
01244                     return true;
01245             }
01246 
01247                 if (strKey == "GroupName")
01248             {
01249                         * static_cast < String * > (pDestValue) =  groupName;
01250                     return true;
01251             }
01252                 
01253                 if (strKey == "BaseCameraViewpoint")
01254             {
01255                         * static_cast < Vector3 * > (pDestValue) =  BaseCameraViewpoint;
01256                     return true;
01257             }
01258             
01259                 if (strKey == "Baselookat")
01260             {
01261                         * static_cast < Vector3 * > (pDestValue) =  Baselookat;
01262                     return true;
01263         }
01264 
01265         if (strKey == "MaxAdjacentPages")
01266         {
01267             * static_cast < unsigned int * > (pDestValue) =  max_adjacent_pages;
01268             return true;
01269         }
01270         if (strKey == "MaxPreloadedPages")
01271         {
01272             * static_cast < unsigned int * > (pDestValue) =  max_preload_pages;
01273             return true;
01274                 }
01275                 if (strKey == "ConfigGroupName")
01276                 {
01277                         * static_cast < String * > (pDestValue) = cfgGroupName;
01278                         return true;
01279                 }  
01280             return false;
01281     }
01282 
01283     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01284     bool PagingLandScapeOptions::hasOption(const String& strKey) const
01285     {
01286             if (strKey == "VisibleRenderables")
01287             {
01288                     return true;
01289             }
01290             if (strKey == "DistanceLOD")
01291             {
01292                     return true;
01293             }
01294             if (strKey == "VisibleDistance")
01295             {
01296                     return true;
01297             }
01298             if (strKey == "VisibleLOD")
01299             {
01300                     return true;
01301             }
01302             // Some options proposed by Praetor
01303             if (strKey == "Width")
01304             {
01305                     return true;
01306             }
01307             if (strKey == "Height")
01308             {
01309                     return true;
01310             }
01311             if (strKey == "PageSize")
01312             {
01313                     return true;
01314             }
01315             if (strKey == "ScaleX")
01316             {
01317                     return true;
01318             }
01319             if (strKey == "ScaleY")
01320             {
01321                     return true;
01322             }
01323             if (strKey == "ScaleZ")
01324             {
01325                     return true;
01326             }
01327             if (strKey == "PositionX")
01328             {
01329                     return true;
01330             }
01331             if (strKey == "PositionY")
01332             {
01333                     return true;
01334             }
01335             if (strKey == "PositionZ")
01336             {
01337                     return true;
01338             }
01339             return false;
01340     }

01398     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01399     bool PagingLandScapeOptions::getOptionKeys(StringVector &refKeys)
01400     {
01401             refKeys.push_back("VisibleRenderables");
01402             refKeys.push_back("DistanceLOD");
01403             refKeys.push_back("VisibleDistance");
01404             refKeys.push_back("VisibleLOD");
01405             // Some options from Praetor
01406             refKeys.push_back("Width");
01407             refKeys.push_back("Height");
01408             refKeys.push_back("PageSize");
01409             refKeys.push_back("ScaleX");
01410             refKeys.push_back("ScaleY");
01411             refKeys.push_back("ScaleZ");
01412             refKeys.push_back("PositionX");
01413             refKeys.push_back("PositionY");
01414             refKeys.push_back("PositionZ");
01415             return true;
01416     }
01417     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01418     void PagingLandScapeOptions::getAvgColors()
01419     {
01420         bool AvgColorsExists = false; 
01421         setBool (AvgColorsExists, "AvgColorsExists");
01422         if (AvgColorsExists)
01423         {   
01424             const String baseName ("MaterialColor");
01425             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < NumMatHeightSplat; i++) 
01426             {   
01427                 const String matColorString (baseName + StringConverter::toString (i));
01428                 setColourValue (matColor[i], matColorString);
01429             }                  
01430         }
01431         else
01432                 {                       
01433                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < NumMatHeightSplat; i++) 
01434                 matColor[i] = _getAvgColor(SplatDetailMapNames[i]);
01435         }
01436     }
01437     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01438     ColourValue PagingLandScapeOptions::_getAvgColor(const String &tex) const
01439     {
01440         if (tex == "")
01441             return ColourValue::White;
01442 
01443             Image img;
01444 
01445             img.load (tex, groupName);
01446             const uchar * const ogre_restrict data = img.getData();
01447         if (!data)
01448         {
01449             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, 
01450                 "You need to define SplatFilename that has at least 3 or 4 bytes componennts (RGB or RGBA)",
01451                 "PagingLandScapeOptions::_getAvgColor");
01452         }    
01453         size_t bpp = PixelUtil::getNumElemBytes (img.getFormat ());
01454         if (bpp < 3)
01455         {
01456             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, 
01457                 "You need to define SplatFilename that has at least 3 or 4 bytes componennts (RGB or RGBA)",
01458                 "PagingLandScapeOptions::_getAvgColor");
01459         }    
01460             int cr = 0, cg = 0, cb = 0, s = 0;
01461                 const size_t imgSize = img.getSize();
01462             for (size_t i = 0; i < imgSize; i += bpp)
01463             {
01464                     cr += data[i];
01465                     cg += data[i+1];
01466                     cb += data[i+2];
01467 
01468                     s++;
01469             }
01470         assert (s > 0);
01471         Real divider = 1.0f /  (s * 255);
01472             return ColourValue (cr * divider, cg * divider, cb * divider, 1.0f);
01473         }
01474         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01475         void PagingLandScapeOptions::clearTileInfo()
01476         {
01477                 if (!mTileInfoCache.empty())
01478                 {
01479                         assert (mCurrentMap != "");
01480                         saveMapInfo();
01481                         std::for_each(mTileInfoCache.begin (),
01482                                                   mTileInfoCache.end (),
01483                                                 delete_object());
01484                         mTileInfoCache.clear();
01485                 }
01486         }
01487         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01488         PagingLandScapeTileInfo *PagingLandScapeOptions::getTileInfo(const uint pageX, const uint pageZ, 
01489                                                                                                                                  const uint tileX, const uint tileZ)
01490         {
01491                 PagingLandScapeTileInfo *t = 0;
01492 
01493                 std::deque<PagingLandScapeTileInfo*>::iterator q = mTileInfoCache.begin ();
01494                 std::deque<PagingLandScapeTileInfo*>::iterator qend = mTileInfoCache.end ();
01495                 while (q != qend)
01496                 {
01497                         t = *q;
01498                         if (pageX == t->mPageX &&
01499                                 pageZ == t->mPageZ &&
01500                                 tileX == t->mTileX &&
01501                                 tileZ == t->mTileZ)
01502                         {
01503                                 return t;
01504                         }
01505                         ++q;
01506                 }
01507                 return 0;
01508         }
01509         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01510         void PagingLandScapeOptions::setTileInfo(PagingLandScapeTileInfo *t)
01511         {
01512                 mTileInfoCache.push_back (t);
01513         }
01514         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01515         void PagingLandScapeOptions::loadMapInfo()
01516         {
01517                 // load terrain.info.cfg into the deque.
01518                 const String fName (mCurrentMap + ".info.cfg");
01519                 if (ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(groupName, fName))
01520                 {
01521                         ConfigFile config;
01522 
01523                         config.load (fName, cfgGroupName, String("="), true);
01524 
01525                         // those info are dependent of Pagesize and Tilesize.
01526                         // if not the same as when generated...
01527                         // we must recompute them.
01528                         const String pageSizeString = config.getSetting(String("PageSize"));
01529                         if (pageSizeString.empty() || PageSize != StringConverter::parseUnsignedInt (pageSizeString)) 
01530                                 return;
01531 
01532                         const String tileSizeString = config.getSetting(String("TileSize"));
01533                         if (tileSizeString.empty() || TileSize != StringConverter::parseUnsignedInt (tileSizeString)) 
01534                                 return;
01535 
01536                         ConfigFile::SettingsIterator setIt = config.getSettingsIterator();
01537                         const size_t numLod = maxRenderLevel;
01538                         PagingLandScapeTileInfo *t;
01539                         while (setIt.hasMoreElements())
01540                         {  
01541                                 const String name = setIt.peekNextKey();
01542                                 const String value = setIt.getNext();
01543                                 if (name != "PageSize" && name != "TileSize")
01544                                 {
01545                                         // name to pageX, uint pageZ, uint tileX, uint tileZ
01546                                         {
01547                                                 std::vector<String> coordinates = StringUtil::split(name, "_");
01548 
01549                                                 const uint pageX = StringConverter::parseUnsignedInt(coordinates[0]);
01550                                                 const uint pageZ = StringConverter::parseUnsignedInt(coordinates[1]);
01551                                                 const uint tileX = StringConverter::parseUnsignedInt(coordinates[2]);
01552                                                 const uint tileZ = StringConverter::parseUnsignedInt(coordinates[3]);
01553 
01554                                                 t = new PagingLandScapeTileInfo(pageX, pageZ, tileX, tileZ);
01555                                         }
01556 
01557                                         // name to LOD roughness value.
01558                                         {
01559                                                 std::vector<String> minLevelDistSqr = StringUtil::split(value, "_");
01560                                                 assert (minLevelDistSqr.size () == numLod);
01561 
01562                                                 t->mMinLevelDistSqr =  new std::vector<Real>();
01563 
01564                                                 t->mMinLevelDistSqr->reserve(numLod);
01565                                                 t->mMinLevelDistSqr->resize(numLod);
01566 
01567                                                 for (size_t i = 0; i < numLod; i++)
01568                                                 {
01569                                                         (*(t->mMinLevelDistSqr))[i]  = StringConverter::parseReal(minLevelDistSqr[i]);
01570                                                 }
01571                                         }
01572                                         mTileInfoCache.push_back(t);
01573                                 }
01574                                 
01575                         }
01576                 }
01577         }
01578         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01579         void PagingLandScapeOptions::saveMapInfo()
01580         {
01581 
01582                 //if(modif ||was_empty when loaded.) ??
01583 
01584                 const String fInfoName (getMapFilename(mCurrentMap) + ".cfg");
01585 
01586                 FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
01587                         groupName, fInfoName);
01588                 FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();     
01589                 if (it != finfo->end())
01590                 {
01591                         // save deque into terrain.info.cfg
01592                         const size_t numLod = maxRenderLevel;
01593                         const String eol("\n");
01594                         const String coordinateSeparator("_");
01595                         const String valueSeparator("=");
01596                         PagingLandScapeTileInfo *t;
01597 
01598                         String tilesInfo("");
01599 
01600                         // those info are dependent of Pagesize and Tilesize.
01601                         // if not the same as when generated...
01602                         // we must recompute them.
01603                         tilesInfo += String("PageSize=")+StringConverter::toString(PageSize) + eol;
01604                         tilesInfo += String("TileSize=")+StringConverter::toString(TileSize) + eol;
01605 
01606                         std::deque<PagingLandScapeTileInfo*>::iterator q = mTileInfoCache.begin ();
01607                         std::deque<PagingLandScapeTileInfo*>::iterator qend = mTileInfoCache.end ();
01608                         while (q != qend)
01609                         {
01610                                 t = *q;
01611 
01612                                 if (t->mMinLevelDistSqr)
01613                                 {
01614                                         bool notEmpty = false;
01615                                         for (size_t i = 0; i < numLod; i++)
01616                                         {
01617                                                 if ((*(t->mMinLevelDistSqr))[i] != 0.0f)
01618                                                 {
01619                                                         notEmpty = true;
01620                                                         break;
01621                                                 }
01622                                         }
01623                                         if (notEmpty)
01624                                         {
01625                                                 tilesInfo += StringConverter::toString(t->mPageX) + coordinateSeparator;
01626                                                 tilesInfo += StringConverter::toString(t->mPageZ) + coordinateSeparator;
01627                                                 tilesInfo += StringConverter::toString(t->mTileX) + coordinateSeparator;
01628                                                 tilesInfo += StringConverter::toString(t->mTileZ);
01629 
01630                                                 tilesInfo += valueSeparator;
01631 
01632                                                 for (size_t i = 0; i < numLod; i++)
01633                                                 {
01634                                                         tilesInfo +=  StringConverter::toString((*(t->mMinLevelDistSqr))[i]) + coordinateSeparator;
01635                                                 }
01636                                                 tilesInfo += eol;
01637                                         }
01638                                 }
01639                                 ++q;
01640                         }
01641 
01642 
01643                         const String fConfigName (mCurrentMap + ".info.cfg");
01644 
01645                         char *olddir = ChangeToDir (const_cast< char * > (((it)->archive->getName()).c_str()));
01646                         std::ofstream outfile;
01647                         outfile.open (const_cast< char * > (fConfigName.c_str())
01648                                                         //,std::ios:b:inary
01649                                                         );
01650                         // Write out
01651                         outfile << tilesInfo;
01652                         outfile.close ();
01653 
01654                         RetablishDir (olddir);
01655                 }
01656 
01657         }
01658 } //namespace
